programme.title: Inside Out Homes
programme.desc: Architect Zac Monro comes up with a radical solution for a 1970s ex-council house in south London - knocking it down and starting again with an open-plan design. In Jesmond, Newcastle, the team is hired to update a 1940s house, adding a garden office and new kitchen. Engineer Monty Ravenscroft transforms the garden shed with mirrors and LED lighting, while Rosie Bines plants a white garden that can be enjoyed both day and night.(n)

programme.title: Motor Sport on 4
programme.desc: Action from recent races at Silverstone.(n)

programme.title: 3rd Rock from the Sun
programme.sub-title: The Thing That Wouldn't Die - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Mary's investigation jeopardises the aliens' mission, Don disappoints Sally and the Big Giant Head brings bad news.(n)

programme.title: 3rd Rock from the Sun
programme.sub-title: The Thing That Wouldn't Die - Part Two.
programme.desc: Last-ever episode. With their mission over, the aliens prepare to leave Earth - but Dick finds himself unable to abandon Mary and wonders if she might join him in outer space. John Lithgow, Jane Curtin and Kristen Johnston star.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ally comes home with a low grade on her report card. Ray is inclined to blame the teacher, but it turns out there is another reason why she is feeling distracted in class. Ray Romano and Patricia Heaton star, with Madylin Sweeten.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Frank are pressured by their wives to join Robert in one of his therapy sessions - but the three of them decide to go to the racetrack instead.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: A forthcoming squash tournament has Frasier on the lookout for a new partner, and an attractive gym coach seems to fit the bill. When lust blooms, the teacher's aggressive performance techniques cannot help but remind the psychiatrist of his old gym teacher. Comedy, guest starring Jeanne Tripplehorn and Bob Hoskins, with Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne's mother infuriates Martin by meddling in his romantic affairs, while Frasier and Niles take part in a charity cycling event - even though neither of them knows how to ride a bike.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy has a date with a mystery man, so Sheldon asks Howard and Raj to help him find a new girlfriend online. When Amy is coy with the details about the guy she's dating, Penny and Bernadette decide to spy on them. Stephen Merchant guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy spend Thanksgiving together as friends, while Howard reluctantly agrees to volunteer at a soup kitchen with Bernadette, Raj and Emily.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is driven to distraction when a tune becomes stuck in his head, while Amy and Dave arrange another date and Howard and Raj discover their band has a fan, but tracking him down turns out to be a mistake. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Mayim Bialik, Simon Helberg and Kunal Nayyar.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Grampa Simpson falls in love with a woman at the rest home who later dies unexpectedly and leaves him $100,000. Understandably taken aback, he does not know what to do with his new-found wealth - but resolves not to share it with Homer.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Grampa is press-ganged into babysitting Bart, Lisa and Maggie while Marge and Homer visit a rural retreat in a bid to save their ailing marriage.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Three Men and a Comic Book.
programme.desc: Bart becomes convinced Milhouse and Martin are trying to steal a valuable comic book they all clubbed together to buy. As his paranoia escalates, the three enter into a dangerous confrontation that threatens to end their friendship. With the guest voice of Daniel Stern.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Down City, a restaurant in Providence, Rhode Island. The no-nonsense chef struggles to persuade hot-headed owner Abby to make his suggested changes, and a confrontation results in him being thrown out of the building in the middle of a dinner service. The eatery's co-owner and financier begs Gordon to return, but his success hinges on his ability to win Abby over.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off at Callum Hogg and Lauren Abraham's modern Park Hotel in Gloucestershire, where sisters Sue Lewis and Wendy Germann are impressed by the colourful decor, but it's not an opinion held by all. The guests are not impressed with having to pay extra for breakfast and Callum and Lauren are faced with robust feedback that leaves them wanting answers and thinking not everyone is being fair.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to Trowbridge in Wiltshire to Sue's B&B, which is run by Sue Lewis and her sister, Wendy Germann. Breakfast at the communal table has its awkward moments and Sue is under pressure, having never cooked for so many before. However, it's the feedback that leaves the hosts wondering if maybe some of the guests have not been that straightforward.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants travel to The Talbot in Iwerne Minster, Dorset for the third day of the competition, where hosts Erika Watt and Ellie Gill greet their guests. The rooms do not live up to their good first impression and Callum and Lauren are quick to find fault. At breakfast, tensions simmer as Wendy calls Cameron a creep, and at feedback, some of the comments send Erika and Ellie into fits of giggles.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The fourth visit of the week is to The Old Rectory in Llangattock, south Wales, where young hotel manager Cameron Thomas likes to keep things professional. Despite wanting to find fault, Lauren and Callum are soon to admit their bridal suite is top notch, but Erika and Ellie think there may be some cleaning issues. During an afternoon of canoe racing the group members show their competitive sides.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The guest house owners meet for the last time to find out what they have been paid and to settle some scores. The Park Hotel in Gloucestershire is up first as owners Callum Hogg and Lauren Abraham want to get to the bottom of why Cameron didn't sleep soundly. Next, Sue Lewis from Sue's B&B seeks to discover the deasons for Callum and Lauren's low score for the cleanliness. When all issues are resolved, the winning establishment is revealed.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman shows Fay Lewis five properties on the Costa del Sol, hoping that on a budget of £95,000, one of them will prove to be her dream home.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.sub-title: Formula 1 Austrian Grand Prix Qualifying Highlights: 2017.
programme.desc: Steve Jones presents action from the qualifying session at the Red Bull Ring in Spielberg, where the drivers battled for pole position ahead of the ninth round of the season. Lewis Hamilton was the dominant force at this race last season, claiming pole position in qualifying, recording the fastest lap during the race, and taking the chequered flag to record his fifth victory of the campaign.(n)

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A scientist carries out genetic experiments on apes, hoping to find a cure for Alzheimer's disease. A chimpanzee used in the tests develops superior intelligence and becomes outraged at the human race's cruel treatment of his kind, forming his fellow primates into an army to overthrow mankind. Sci-fi thriller, starring James Franco, Freida Pinto and Andy Serkis.(n)

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A disorganised woman is asked to be maid of honour at her best friend's wedding. Taking charge of the prenuptial bridal celebrations, she resolves to give her pal and accompanying bridesmaids the time of their lives, but as her efforts slide into chaos she finds the wife of the groom's boss is keen to usurp her position. Comedy, with Kristen Wiig, Rose Byrne and Melissa McCarthy.(n)

programme.title: Red Eye
programme.desc: A hotel manager overcomes her fear of flying and boards a busy late-night flight to Miami, seating herself next to the seemingly friendly man she met in the airport. However, once the plane leaves the ground, she discovers her fellow passenger is a terrorist intent on involving her in an assassination plot. Wes Craven's suspense thriller, starring Rachel McAdams, Cillian Murphy and Brian Cox.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: In Oregon, Gordon Ramsay tries to rescue the Applegate River Lodge, which is around $1million in debt. The chef questions whether owner Richard Davis's interest in smoking cannabis is distracting him from the problems at this family-built inn, and encounters Richard's sons Duke and Dusty, whose fiery relationship seems to prevent them from working together to tackle the establishment's financial troubles.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Omnibus. Milo helps Cindy to fake a robbery at The Emporium for the sympathy vote in the election, while Jesse takes Grace for a viewing at a potential new club. Elsewhere, Goldie panics when she finds out that Hunter and Simone have gone to the police station to tell the truth about Prince.(n)

programme.title: Ackley Bridge
programme.desc: Kaneez is initially furious to discover that Nas is considering the arranged marriage, but the pressure of planning the wedding and her web of lies leads Nas to break down to her mum and confess that she is gay. While focusing on helping Missy get Hayley back and also straightening out Simone, Emma neglects Chloe on her birthday, sending Chloe off the rails, while Steve battles with Mandy's indiscretion, leaving him wondering whether they have a future together after all.(n)

programme.title: Shipping Wars UK
programme.desc: The race for Transporter of the Week reaches its climax with Russell driving his big rig through the small Georgian streets of Stamford, Lincolnshire.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer travel to Aberdeen, where they give expert advice to newlyweds who are looking for a spacious city-centre home, and a couple willing to leave the hustle and bustle behind to find a rural retreat.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug turns the basement into a recreation room when his big-screen TV is delivered - until Carrie's father and sister move in. Pilot episode of the comedy, starring Kevin James and Leah Remini.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: After stumbling on a photo of Carrie's overweight mother, Doug pretends to go on a diet to persuade his wife to lose a few pounds. Kevin James stars.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra invites her divorced parents to Thanksgiving dinner, and Raymond sees something shocking that convinces him they are getting back together. The truth, however, proves far stranger. Robert Culp and Katherine Helmond guest star.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray is annoyed to discover Marie is plying his brother with gifts of scented candles and massage oils. However, his mood changes when he deduces her real motive - to put Robert in a romantic mood, in the hope he will provide her with grandchildren.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Crane brothers are delighted when their social standing grows thanks to a Russian caviar dealer, who offers them good quality roe at knock-down prices. Daphne tries to persuade a reluctant Martin to return $40 dispensed in error by a cash machine.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The shrink turns interior designer to help a local home-building scheme, but his plans prove too grand for the new residents, and he is soon shown the door. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: A street singer annoys Frasier and Niles, prompting them to set out in search of a new coffee house to frequent, and Daphne has her physical therapy techniques evaluated by an independent professional. Elvis Costello guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer are joined by guests Caroline Flack, Verity Rushworth and Ed Byrne. With music from Cold War Kids.(n)

programme.title: Eat the Week
programme.desc: Simon Rimmer shows a family how to make smoked haddock koulibiak, smokey chilli and chocolate trifle, while Michela Chiappa reports on rhubarb, chorizo and chillis.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Selma realises her hopes of ever bearing a child are diminishing and flies to China to adopt a baby. Asked to fill in her husband's name on the application, she pretends to be married to Homer - but the company co-ordinator (guest star Lucy Liu) sees through the deception. Also featuring the voices of Robert Wagner and David Silverman.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer moves into a camper van parked in the backyard, while Marge retains sole residence of the family home, prompting Bart to take swift action in a bid to reunite them. Unfortunately, his plan entails a perilous drive along the freeway - which culminates in a disaster on board a Turkish container ship.(n)

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: The architect meets a father and son building an ambitious clifftop retreat and a young architect embarking on his first commission - a garden pavilion for his gran. Master craftsman Will Hardie sets out to transform the humble beach hut into the most unlikely of holiday getaways, and in Germany, George visits a modern house in a medieval town.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: A few years ago Kieran Alexander was involved in a serious motorbike accident that has given her, and partner Dave Dwyer, a new outlook on life - that it is for living and there is no time like the present. They've decided to leave their stressful lives in the UK behind and start again in the Azores in the Atlantic. With a budget of £100,000 to fund their new home, Ben Hillman shows them five properties on the main island of Sao Miguel.(n)

programme.title: Homes by the Sea
programme.desc: Charlie Luxton visits properties in Suffolk, including a house in the clouds, a contemporary coastal cottage in Southwold, and a seafront town house in Aldeburgh.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: Steve Jones and David Coulthard present action from the ninth round of the season, which took place at the Red Bull Ring in Spielberg. All eyes will have been on Sebastian Vettel and Lewis Hamilton at this meeting following their racing incident at the Azerbaijan Grand Prix last time out, which only served to heat up their rivalry as they continue to battle for the drivers' championship.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of China's Forbidden City
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the Beijing palace that housed Chinese emperors for 600 years. The programme reveals the current conservation work being carried out and uncovers new details about past rulers, including trade with Europe and how a marble staircase was transported along an ice road. A scale model is used to demonstrate how the structure was built to withstand earthquakes.(n)

programme.title: The Handmaid's Tale
programme.desc: Offred remembers her family's escape attempt, leading to a shocking revelation about her life before the Gilead regime that gives her a new perspective on her current situation.(n)

programme.title: Epidemic: When Britain Fought Aids
programme.desc: Documentary examining the impact of the disease on British society, and how it has influenced the country in subsequent years. Paul O'Grady and Jean Paul Gaultier are among those sharing their personal stories, as well as activists and frontline doctors.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts, with Sean Lock and Stephen Mangan taking on guest captain Richard Ayoade and Katherine Ryan, and Bill Bailey in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Two secret agents find their lifelong friendship threatened when they fall in love with the same woman. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie O'Donnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Inside Windsor Castle
programme.desc: Documentary marking the centenary of the Windsor dynasty by examining the history of the royal residence over the past 80 years, looking at the tragedies and triumphs that have had an impact on the Queen and her family. The first edition reflects on the events of the past 25 years, including the fire in November 1992 that started in the private chapel and came at the end of a terrible year for the royals, with marital troubles hitting the Queen's three elder children.(n)

programme.title: Inside Windsor Castle
programme.desc: A look back at the series of events that shaped the monarchy between 1936 and 1952, using dramatic reconstructions and an extraordinary archive of film. Edward VIII's abdication in 1936 meant that his brother ?Bertie' became King George VI, and his eldest daughter Elizabeth was now suddenly and unexpectedly heir to the throne. When the Second World War broke out, Elizabeth and her sister Margaret moved into the safe haven that was Windsor Castle, which Elizabeth loved for its history and its heritage, while for Margaret it was one big adventure playground.(n)

programme.title: Inside Windsor Castle
programme.desc: A look back at events that shaped the monarchy between 1952 and 1972, using dramatic reconstructions and archive film. As the royal family made Windsor its home, Prince Philip grew restless. The Queen assigned him as ranger of Windsor Great Park, but that only led to more problems. Meanwhile, Princess Margaret exhibited a wild streak to her character as a party animal, the Queen Mother reportedly ran up debts of £7million, and the papers began to print stories suggesting extramarital affairs had taken place.(n)

programme.title: Inside Windsor Castle
programme.desc: The series concludes with a look at 20 years in the life of the Queen and her family. It covers the era from 1972, when she celebrated her 25th wedding anniversary to 1992, when several divorces and a fire at Windsor Castle rocked one of the world's best-loved families. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: That's So
programme.desc: Memories of the year Italy hosted the World Cup, in which England lost to Germany in the semi-finals on penalties. Back home, Mrs Thatcher resigned as prime minister, reluctantly handing over the reins to John Major and Eurotunnel builders from the UK and France met 40 metres beneath the Channel, establishing the first land connection between Britain and mainland Europe for 8,000 years. Fears of the spread of BSE - so-called mad cow disease - grew, while culturally, every child wanted to be a Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle and, thanks to Madonna, everyone was Vogueing.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.sub-title: OMG! Make Me a Famous Face.
programme.desc: People undergoing cosmetic surgery to look like celebrities, including a Katie Price fan undergoing dangerous low budget tanning procedures, and a model trying to transform herself into Kim Kardashian and her friend into Zayn Malik. Plus, a man who wants to look like a Ken doll - to his boyfriend's horror.(n)

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A bail enforcement agent is assigned the task of tracking down his own ex-wife, a wily reporter chasing a story about a murder cover-up. However, bringing his former spouse to justice is harder than he anticipated, not least because she has also been targeted by the criminal she is investigating. Action comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Jennifer Aniston, Gio Perez, Joel Garland, Jason Kolotouros and Matt Malloy.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Ford Fairlane
programme.desc: A rock-and-roll detective who floats through the clubs of Hollywood, picking up women and clients, stumbles into a case involving the death of a heavy metal singer(n)

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
programme.desc: Family fantasy about a boy who, after encountering a real vampire at a freak show, finds himself employed as his apprentice and involved in an ancient grudge against another clan(n)

programme.title: Street Fighter: The Legend of Chun-Li
programme.desc: Fearsome fighter Chun-Li faces off against a series of formidable opponents in this feature adaptation of the popular video-game franchise. When a teenager, she witnessed the kidnapping of her father by wealthy crime lord M. Bison. Now that she's a grown up, she goes into a quest for vengeance and becomes the famous crime-fighter of the Street Fighter universe(n)

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Giant carnivorous worms threaten a desert community in this good-natured spoof of a B-grade 1950s horror movie(n)

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: The true story of Texas electrician Ron Woodroof, who was diagnosed as HIV positive in 1986, and subsequently devoted his life to providing unapproved drugs and supplements to fellow HIV patients during an era when doctors were still struggling to understand the virus(n)

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Entertaining biopic of Michael "Eddie the Eagle" Edwards, whose participation in the 1988 Winter Olympics marked the first time a Brit had ever competed at ski jumping. Edwards trains for the sport with a former champ, and finds fame as a lovable loser who's just trying his best(n)

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: A a meek univeristy student living on her own in New York City meets Brooke, her stepsister-to-be, and is soon entranced by her worldliness and flummoxed by her impulsive nature(n)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: In a side-splitting film that brings together some of comedy's sharpest talent, 30 Rock star Tina Fey, Amy Poehler and writer/director Michael McCullers join forces to tell the story of two women, one apartment and the nine months that will change their lives. The always winning and wry Fey portrays a focused and driven New York career woman who desperately wants a baby but is physically unable to carry the child herself. Undaunted, she recruits a South Philly working girl (Poehler) to act as her surrogate. Everything goes according to plan until a pregnant Poehler shows up on Fey's doorstep with no place to live, and suddenly two very different women are joined together to create a very unexpected family(n)

programme.title: Diner
programme.desc: Set in 1959, Diner shows how five young men resist their adulthood and seek refuge in their beloved Diner(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Into the Blue stars Paul Walker and Jessica Alba as a pair of would-be fortune hunters who look for treasure at the bottom of the ocean after hurricane season. Their happy life in the Bahamas takes a turn when they get a visit from his old childhood friend (Scott Caan and his girlfriend (Ashley Scott). The foursome eventually discover a huge supply of seemingly abandoned cargo in a plane at the bottom of the ocean. They must battle both the bad guys who own the goods, as well as the shark that live in the water(n)

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: This quirky thriller follows Mark Whitacre, who discovers that his company is involved in price-fixing and turns informant for the FBI. Convinced he'll be a hero, he wears a wire to gather the evidence needed to convict his bosses. Unfortunately, both the case and Whitacre's integrity are compromised when FBI agents discover that he isn't the saintly figure he made himself out to be(n)

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: This piercing drama follows a working-class American, a French journalist and a London schoolboy as their lives intersect when their collective grief leads them on a journey to discover the truth about the afterlife(n)

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax
programme.desc: A neurologist (Jamie Dornan) investigates the case of a young boy who has somehow repeatedly cheated death (Aiden Longworth) after the youth survives yet another near-fatal accident on his ninth birthday. As the doctor becomes obsessed with this mystery, he also develops romantic feelings for the boy's mother (Sarah Gadon). Aaron Paul (Breaking Bad, The Path) co-stars(n)

programme.title: All the President's Men
programme.desc: Washington Post reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein investigate a 1972 burglary at the Democratic National Committee headquarters, eventually discovering a cover-up that would lead to President Richard Nixon's resignation. Adaptation of Woodward and Bernstein's book(n)

programme.title: The Hunted
programme.desc: After witnessing a murder, a businessman visiting Japan is targeted by a ruthless clan of ninjas. He teams up with a samurai bent on ending a feud between their clans(n)

programme.title: WarGames
programme.desc: A young student accidentally accesses a military central computer thinking it is a new computer game(n)

programme.title: O
programme.desc: The classic story of ambition and envy is transferred to an exclusive American high school, where a basketball star goes out with the headmaster's daughter, unaware of the extent of his best friend's jealousy(n)

programme.title: Wish I Was Here
programme.desc: A 35-year-old father who's never quite grown up learns about life when he's forced to homeschool his kids, since their grandpa can no longer afford their private-school tuition and their public school is a mess(n)

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Biopic of Ernie Davis, who overcame prejudice to become the first black athlete to win the highest honour in college football(n)

programme.title: Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: An epic version of the legendary western sheriff-gunslinger, Wyatt Earp's life story, who lived from 1848 to 1929. Growing up on a farm in Iowa, Earp tries to run away to join the Union Army in the Civil War, but he is turned away because of his youth. Instead, he studies law and marries Urilla Sutherland. But Urilla dies of typhoid fever before they can have children, and Earp grows despondent and loses his way(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Based on a novel by Elleston Trevor, director John Moore's The Flight of the Phoenix is a remake of a 1965 film of the same name starring film icon James Stewart. The story revolves around the plight of Captain Frank Towns (Dennis Quaid), a pilot whose C-119 cargo plane full of oil workers could not withstand the violent winds of a desert sandstorm. Stranded in the harsh terrain of Mongolia's Gobi Desert (a departure from the original, in which the plane crashed in the Sahara), Frank and his navigator face an equal challenge in maintaining order among the survivors. The group of oilmen had planned on an uneventful trip to shut off a group of rigs falling below their productivity expectations -- not fending for their very lives. Before long, some men are revealed as cowards, while others exhibit a surprising show of strength, all the while hoping that the wreckage of the original plane can be salvaged before a Lord of the Flies situation occurs. Miranda Otto is featured in a supporting role, as well as Giovanni Ribisi and Tyrese Gibson(n)

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: A supernatural being that can only be seen when the lights go out attacks a family and one of them has to step up to protect the others(n)

programme.title: The Forest
programme.desc: A young woman (Natalie Dormer) searches for her twin sister in an infamous Japanese forest beneath Mount Fuji where lost souls go to commit suicide. With the help of an American guide (Taylor Kinney), she treks into the heart of the mysterious woodland. Jason Zada directed this horror thriller(n)

programme.desc: Entertaining biopic of Michael "Eddie the Eagle" Edwards, whose participation in the 1988 Winter Olympics marked the first time a Brit had ever competed at ski jumping. Edwards trains for the sport with a former champ, and finds fame as a lovable loser who's just trying his best(n)

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: A a meek univeristy student living on her own in New York City meets Brooke, her stepsister-to-be, and is soon entranced by her worldliness and flummoxed by her impulsive nature(n)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: In a side-splitting film that brings together some of comedy's sharpest talent, 30 Rock star Tina Fey, Amy Poehler and writer/director Michael McCullers join forces to tell the story of two women, one apartment and the nine months that will change their lives. The always winning and wry Fey portrays a focused and driven New York career woman who desperately wants a baby but is physically unable to carry the child herself. Undaunted, she recruits a South Philly working girl (Poehler) to act as her surrogate. Everything goes according to plan until a pregnant Poehler shows up on Fey's doorstep with no place to live, and suddenly two very different women are joined together to create a very unexpected family(n)

programme.title: Diner
programme.desc: Set in 1959, Diner shows how five young men resist their adulthood and seek refuge in their beloved Diner(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Into the Blue stars Paul Walker and Jessica Alba as a pair of would-be fortune hunters who look for treasure at the bottom of the ocean after hurricane season. Their happy life in the Bahamas takes a turn when they get a visit from his old childhood friend (Scott Caan and his girlfriend (Ashley Scott). The foursome eventually discover a huge supply of seemingly abandoned cargo in a plane at the bottom of the ocean. They must battle both the bad guys who own the goods, as well as the shark that live in the water(n)

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: This quirky thriller follows Mark Whitacre, who discovers that his company is involved in price-fixing and turns informant for the FBI. Convinced he'll be a hero, he wears a wire to gather the evidence needed to convict his bosses. Unfortunately, both the case and Whitacre's integrity are compromised when FBI agents discover that he isn't the saintly figure he made himself out to be(n)

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: This piercing drama follows a working-class American, a French journalist and a London schoolboy as their lives intersect when their collective grief leads them on a journey to discover the truth about the afterlife(n)

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax
programme.desc: A neurologist (Jamie Dornan) investigates the case of a young boy who has somehow repeatedly cheated death (Aiden Longworth) after the youth survives yet another near-fatal accident on his ninth birthday. As the doctor becomes obsessed with this mystery, he also develops romantic feelings for the boy's mother (Sarah Gadon). Aaron Paul (Breaking Bad, The Path) co-stars(n)

programme.title: All the President's Men
programme.desc: Washington Post reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein investigate a 1972 burglary at the Democratic National Committee headquarters, eventually discovering a cover-up that would lead to President Richard Nixon's resignation. Adaptation of Woodward and Bernstein's book(n)

programme.title: The Hunted
programme.desc: After witnessing a murder, a businessman visiting Japan is targeted by a ruthless clan of ninjas. He teams up with a samurai bent on ending a feud between their clans(n)

programme.title: WarGames
programme.desc: A young student accidentally accesses a military central computer thinking it is a new computer game(n)

programme.title: O
programme.desc: The classic story of ambition and envy is transferred to an exclusive American high school, where a basketball star goes out with the headmaster's daughter, unaware of the extent of his best friend's jealousy(n)

programme.title: Wish I Was Here
programme.desc: A 35-year-old father who's never quite grown up learns about life when he's forced to homeschool his kids, since their grandpa can no longer afford their private-school tuition and their public school is a mess(n)

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Biopic of Ernie Davis, who overcame prejudice to become the first black athlete to win the highest honour in college football(n)

programme.title: Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: An epic version of the legendary western sheriff-gunslinger, Wyatt Earp's life story, who lived from 1848 to 1929. Growing up on a farm in Iowa, Earp tries to run away to join the Union Army in the Civil War, but he is turned away because of his youth. Instead, he studies law and marries Urilla Sutherland. But Urilla dies of typhoid fever before they can have children, and Earp grows despondent and loses his way(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Based on a novel by Elleston Trevor, director John Moore's The Flight of the Phoenix is a remake of a 1965 film of the same name starring film icon James Stewart. The story revolves around the plight of Captain Frank Towns (Dennis Quaid), a pilot whose C-119 cargo plane full of oil workers could not withstand the violent winds of a desert sandstorm. Stranded in the harsh terrain of Mongolia's Gobi Desert (a departure from the original, in which the plane crashed in the Sahara), Frank and his navigator face an equal challenge in maintaining order among the survivors. The group of oilmen had planned on an uneventful trip to shut off a group of rigs falling below their productivity expectations -- not fending for their very lives. Before long, some men are revealed as cowards, while others exhibit a surprising show of strength, all the while hoping that the wreckage of the original plane can be salvaged before a Lord of the Flies situation occurs. Miranda Otto is featured in a supporting role, as well as Giovanni Ribisi and Tyrese Gibson(n)

programme.title: Lights Out

programme.title: The Forest
programme.desc: A young woman (Natalie Dormer) searches for her twin sister in an infamous Japanese forest beneath Mount Fuji where lost souls go to commit suicide. programme.title: Tutankhamun: Secrets of the Boy King
programme.desc: The treasure of Tutankhamun is a fabulous gold hoard, the story of its discovery the stuff of legend. In this film, one of the original founders' ancestors questions old theories.(n)

programme.title: King Tut's Mystery Tomb Opened
programme.desc: Egyptologist Otto Schaden and a team of archaeologists continue their excavations of a burial chamber in the necropolis used by the pharaohs beneath Egypt's legendary Valley of the Kings, a tomb known only as KV63.(n)

programme.title: Egypt's Mystery Chamber
programme.desc: Investigation into the unearthing of an ancient Egyptian tomb in the Valley of the Kings in 2005, the first burial site found since the discovery of Tutankhamun's resting place in 1922. The film also reveals how experts believe a golden casket retrieved on location may have belonged to the pharaoh's child bride.(n)

programme.title: Egypt's New Tomb Revealed
programme.desc: The excavation of a gold coffin, found in the Valley of the Kings, close to the burial place of Tutankhamun. The discovery of the grave in 2006 was the first in the area for more than 80 years. The expedition, headed by renowned archaeologist Otto Schaden, is revealed in step-by-step detail, including possible answers to the mysteries unearthed along the way.(n)

programme.title: Hidden History of Egypt
programme.desc: Monty Python veteran Terry Jones presents a light-hearted interpretation of the complexities of ancient Egyptian life.(n)

programme.title: Why Ancient Egypt Fell
programme.desc: The collapse of the ancient Egyptian civilisation, and claims by scientists that a new discovery could solve the mystery and serve as a warning from history.(n)

programme.title: Women Pharaohs
programme.desc: The powerful secrets of ancient Egypt's female rulers, including Cleopatra, Nefertiti, Nefertari and Hatshepsut, who between them governed the land for 400 years.(n)

programme.title: Sun Pharaoh
programme.desc: Portrait of ancient Egyptian ruler Akhenaten and his wife Nefertiti, who together established the world's first monotheistic religion to worship the sun god Aten.(n)

programme.title: Nefertiti
programme.desc: Archaeologist Nicholas Reeves' quest to discover the tomb of Tutankhamun's stepmother, believed to be the last burial chamber in the Valley of the Kings.(n)

programme.title: Lost Mummy of Imhotep
programme.desc: Archaeologist Karol Mysliwiec goes in search of the burial site of Imhotep, the architect of the Step Pyramid in Sakkara, one of the world's first monumental stone buildings. He was later deified as a god for his skills as a healer and physician.(n)

programme.title: Curiosity
programme.sub-title: Curiosity: Nefertiti - Mummy Queen Mystery: Nefertiti: Mummy Queen Mystery.
programme.desc: Dr Zahi Hawas leads a team of experts as they attempt to solve the mystery of Queen Nefertiti, who disappeared without a trace whilst at the height of her power.(n)

programme.title: Battlefield
programme.sub-title: The Siege of Leningrad - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. How the German Army's siege of Leningrad during the Second World War devastated the Soviet Union's second city. Liberation was finally achieved in January 1944 after a harrowing 890 days during which 600,000 citizens starved to death and 200,000 were killed in bombing raids.(n)

programme.title: Battlefield
programme.sub-title: The Siege of Leningrad - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. How the German Army's siege of Leningrad during the Second World War devastated the Russian city, lasting 890 days until the Soviet counter-offensive of 1943.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: A search for the remains of Roxburgh, formerly one of Scotland's great medieval centres, which eventually fell into decline and disappeared in the 16th century. With only a ruined castle as a clue to the lost city's layout, Phil Harding and his army of diggers have just three days to peel back the layers of history and identify the royal seat of David I, which was burnt to the ground in 1460. Presented by Tony Robinson.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Cranborne Chase, Dorset: Brimming with Remains.
programme.desc: The team explores the many delights of Dorset farmer Simon Meadon's fields. Crammed with finds, from a possible Romano-British villa to a Bronze Age boundary ditch, the site is a complex one, and the work is increased by the important discovery of a number of burials. With just three days to unpick thousands of years of history, the experts struggle to unearth what made the area so special.(n)

programme.title: Natural Born Outlaws
programme.desc: A profile of the Barker-Karpis gang, which was one of the longest-lived criminal organisations during the Depression Era, and was reportedly run by the Barker brothers' mother.(n)

programme.title: Elite Forces
programme.desc: Documentary examining the history of the US Army Rangers, who have fought in major conflicts across the world.(n)

programme.title: Battlefield
programme.desc: Part two of two. The infamous Pearl Harbour attack in 1941, which marked a turning point in the Second World War and caused the deaths of more than 2,000 Americans - shocking the country to the core and prompting the US government to join the conflict. Witnesses of the horrific event discuss how the bombers flew so low the faces of the pilots could be seen, and reflect on the treatment subsequently received by the Japanese population living in America at the time.(n)

At the end of an arduous shift, she discovers her hard work is to be rewarded with promotion to sergeant. Guest starring Kara Tointon, Barry Sloane and Gareth David-Lloyd.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: On her first shift as a sergeant, Jo is called to the scene of an aggravated robbery in which the homeowner died in a particularly violent and bloody way. When it emerges the victim was an abusive drunk and had been involved with another woman, Grace warms to the man's Asian-born widow and clashes with Max over his apparent racial prejudice. Gabrielle Glaister guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: A letter bomb addressed to the manager of a successful company proves to be harmless but, after talking to the witnesses, Grace has a hunch that worse is to follow. The intended `victim' turns out to be cheating on his pregnant wife with his secretary, and a courier bears a grudge after being thrown out of the office, but the main suspect is the manager's own brother, who had recently been sacked.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: A baby girl, recently delivered by Jenny, is snatched from her pram, uniting the community in a desperate search for the missing child. A newlywed couple are excited about becoming parents - but when the wife develops a serious medical condition, their chances of happiness are jeopardised. Jessica Raine, Bryony Hannah and Miranda Hart star in the 1950s-set nursing drama, with Thomasin Rand and Tom Goodman-Hill.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Jenny befriends Nonnatus House cleaner Peggy and her brother Frank, who has cancer, and learns all about the siblings' upbringing in the workhouse and the effect it has had on their relationship. Meanwhile, Fred has a new money-making venture - a pig called Evie - but his hopes of bringing home the bacon are scuppered when it turns out the porker is pregnant, so the midwives rally round to deliver the piglets.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Sister Monica Joan develops pneumonia after being found mysteriously wandering near the docks - but things only gets worse when she is accused of theft and faces the prospect of prison. Chummy's mother arrives to meet PC Noakes, but when the visit is less than a success, the midwife suffers a crisis of confidence and breaks off her relationship - leaving Jenny and the others trying to persuade her she is making a terrible mistake. Judy Parfitt, Miranda Hart and Jessica Raine star.(n)

programme.title: Catherine Cookson's The Gambling Man
programme.desc: Robson Green stars in the title role as Rory Connor, a rent collector who spends his nights at the gaming tables, secure in the knowledge that nobody can turn a card quite like him. Unfortunately, as the stakes get higher, Connor finds himself gambling more than money - with dramatic consequences for himself and those around him. Feature-length drama, with Bernard Hill and Sylvestra Le Touzel.(n)

programme.title: The Musketeers
programme.desc: Porthos wakes up in the street after a drunken night to find a dead body beside him, and is promptly sentenced to death. But then he is abducted by a mysterious gang of criminals who carry him off to the slums of Paris - the streets of his childhood - meaning the other Musketeers must infiltrate this dangerous district if they are to find their friend and prove his innocence. Howard Charles, Luke Pasqualino, Tom Burke and Santiago Cabrera star, with Ashley Walters and Anton Lesser.(n)

programme.title: Jonathan Creek
programme.desc: A veteran comedian is found dead in a sealed fallout shelter. Locked from the inside of the concrete bunker with no other means of exit, all clues point to suicide, but Maddy Magellan thinks otherwise and calls on the services of professional illusionist Jonathan Creek. Offbeat detective drama, starring Caroline Quentin and Alan Davies.(n)

programme.title: The Doctor Blake Mysteries
programme.desc: A Ballarat College schoolboy-rower wins a race on Lake Wendouree - only to drown after being ceremonially tossed in the lake. His mother asks Doctor Blake to find the truth behind her son's death, but Blake discovers that the truth is a murkier affair than expected, and that the boy was not the small-town sporting hero everyone - including his mother - thought he was.(n)

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Double bill. Nikki and Jack are called to a petrol station where three people have been shot dead, and conclude it is the work of a concealed shooter working from long range - a sniper is at large in London. They combine ballistics and wound pathology with the killer-profiling skills of senior investigator DCI Jane De Freitas, as they work to find this seemingly random murderer before panic hits the city. Starring Emilia Fox, David Caves and Richard Lintern, with Zoe Telford and Steve Wall.(n)

programme.title: Spooks
programme.desc: The French Intelligence Service asks for MI5's help in catching an arms expert suspected of trying to sell Eurofighter technology to the highest bidder. It seems a 14-year-old thief holds the key to acquiring the information, but the operation slides into disarray when the government orders the British team to acquire it for themselves, turning an exercise in international co-operation into a web of lies and mistrust. Matthew Macfadyen, Keeley Hawes and David Oyelowo star.(n)

programme.title: Famously Single
programme.desc: Let's Do Some Damage. Chad opens up to Dr. Darcy about his villainous ways. And later, the singles challenge their comfort zones as they set out to fill a party bus with other singles for a party back at the loft. That is, until Calum decides he's had enough(n)

programme.title: Botched
programme.desc: Boob-Watch. Nicole Eggert wants smaller breasts after her last surgeon went too big; Terry tries to reconstruct a woman who survived a flesh-eating bacteria; and an international flight attendant meets with the doctors(n)

programme.title: Botched

programme.title: Botched

programme.title: Botched
programme.desc: Double D-isaster. Paul helps a female impersonator who isn't comfortable walking the streets without makeup; a woman with "sideshow boobs" goes under the knife to improve her marriage; the doctors extract silicone star implants from a former body-modification enthusiast(n)

programme.title: Botched

programme.desc: Plastic Fantastic. programme.title: Botched

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: This blockbusting romantic drama, centred around the relationship between hard-up young rogue Jack and an unwilling society bride, Rose, both passengers on the doomed liner. Jack has little in the way of wealth, but his lust for life brings Rose back from the brink of suicide and the pair begin an intense affair cut short by the tragic climax of that fateful night. This romantic drama, which won 11 Oscars and has taken a prominent place in modern cinema history(n)

programme.title: Maid in Manhattan
programme.desc: Jennifer Lopez and Ralph Fiennes star in director Wayne Wang's modern-day interpretation of Cinderella. Single parent Marisa Ventura works in an upmarket New York hotel where a swanky event is taking place. When one of the guests asks her to return a beautiful freebie dress, Marisa can't resist trying it on. And that's when she bumps into rising politico Christopher Marshall, who is clearly smitten. Based on her appearance, he assumes that she's a socialite, but will he still be as attracted to her if he discovers that she's a maid? Also starring Stanley Tucci, Bob Hoskins and Amy Sedaris. Edited for language(n)

programme.title: Monster-in-Law
programme.desc: It's not unusual to see two women fighting over the same man in a movie, only this time it's his mother and his fiancée vying for his attention in this broad comedy. While Charlotte Cantilini (Jennifer Lopez), known to her friends as Charlie, has never had much luck in her love life, one day her ship arrives in a big way when she meets Kevin Fields (Michael Vartan), a doctor who is charming, handsome, and wealthy. Kevin also has a famous mother, Viola Fields (Jane Fonda), who has enjoyed a long and successful career as a news broadcaster. When Kevin and Charlie fall head over heels for one another, he opts to propose marriage to her as he's introducing Charlie to Viola over lunch. However, as far as Viola is concerned, this could not come at a worse time -- Viola has just been fired from the anchor desk, and regards her son as the only anchor left in her life. Not willing to share Kevin with anyone, Viola sets out to sabotage his relationship with Charlie in any way she can, often with the wary assistance of her secretary Ruby (Wanda Sykes). But once Charlie gets wind of Viola's schemes, she decides two can play this game. Monster-in-Law marked Jane Fonda's return to the screen after a long leave of absence; it was her first film after co-starring with Robert De Niro in 1990's Stanley & Iris(n)

Finally, Sam and Nick throw the last party, but their rivals are uneasy ahead of arriving at their home, since the pair spent much of their time during a previous engagement discussing their plans for surviving a zombie apocalypse.(n)

programme.desc: Three couples from Portsmouth compete, with Claire and Alex kicking things off with an organic, nutritionally balanced meal that satisfies their new-age philosophies.(n)

programme.desc: Mel gets back in touch with a childhood friend, and as things progress romantically, Joe fears they could actually be relatives. Meanwhile, Lennox faces a moral dilemma when she discovers that her blog's new sponsor participates in unethical labour practices. Guest starring Trevor Donovan.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Joe accidentally injures Austin during a game of pool, foiling his plan for a romantic weekend away with Mel. Meanwhile, a home-schooled student begins studying with Ryder, but the new arrangement soon turns sour.(n)

Plus, Lennox enlists Ryder's help when she struggles to write her college admissions essay. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

Meanwhile, Ryder's girlfriend Keira is impressed by his undeserved bad boy reputation, but her parents are not. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.desc: Erica and Barry get jobs at Spencer's Gifts, then Murray insists Adam get a job as well, but Beverly is adamant that he should focus on film-making.(n)

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off

programme.desc: Sheldon wins a grant to pay for a summer expedition to the North Pole, and invites his friends to join him. However, the gang's imminent departure causes Leonard and Penny to reconsider their feelings for each other. Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon returns to Texas in disgrace when he discovers his friends tampered with the Arctic expedition data after growing tired of his quest for a scientific breakthrough. Elsewhere, Leonard becomes frustrated as constant interruptions hamper his attempts to woo Penny.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Howard stake their most coveted comic books on a bet over the species of a cricket, while Leonard and Penny struggle to recover from an awkward first night together. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon succeeds in getting Penny to conform to his high standards, so Leonard adopts a similar strategy for his romantic gain. Meanwhile, Howard and Raj meet two women at a goth nightclub and things appear to go well - until they are taken to a tattoo parlour.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon cannot contain his jealousy when he hears that his university colleague Bert has won a prestigious fellowship with an impressive grant. Elsewhere, Howard finds an old remote-controlled toy he made in the past, but the rest of the group do not seemed to be too impressed by it. Stephen Hawking guest stars.(n)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Wicked fashion designer Cruella De Vil steals a huge litter of newborn Dalmatian puppies to turn into a magnificent coat - but the lucky pups have many four-legged friends who are determined the evil woman and her cronies will get their just deserts. Disney's live-action remake of the animated comedy adventure, starring Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Hugh Laurie and Mark Williams.(n)

programme.title: The Crystal Maze
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade guides Joel Dommett, Jermaine Jenas, Adil Ray, Tamara Wall and team captain Rylan Clark-Neal on an epic adventure through four fantastical zones - Aztec, Medieval, Industrial and Futuristic. In each zone the team members must conquer physical, skill, mystery and mental challenges in a bid to win crystals. These elusive crystals each give them five seconds inside the iconic Crystal Dome, where they hope to collect gold tokens to convert into prizes.(n)

programme.title: The Inbetweeners 2
programme.desc: Awkward teenagers Will, Simon and Neil find university life does not live up to their expectations, and are insanely jealous of Jay's stories of his gap year in Australia. Heading Down Under to meet their friend, they inevitably discover he has exaggerated his escapades - so decide to go in search of a real adventure. Comedy sequel, starring Simon Bird, James Buckley, Joe Thomas and Blake Harrison.(n)

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Will discovers that attending a mixed-sex school is not so bad after all when he manages to get a date with the most popular girl in the year above. However, his growing obsession with her begins to alienate him from his friends. Comedy, starring Simon Bird, Joe Thomas, James Buckley and Blake Harrison.(n)

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: The lads visit a Caravan Club meeting under the impression that it is really a massive orgy, but are embarrassed when Jay's dad decides to give them advice on sex - whether they like it or not. Sitcom about four teenagers growing up in suburbia, starring Simon Bird, Joe Thomas, James Buckley and Blake Harrison.(n)

programme.title: WRC Review
programme.desc: All the thrills and spills from Rally Poland, round eight of the FIA World Rally Championship. First established in 1921, Rally Poland is one of the world's oldest rallies.(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: Why Sharks Attack
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the unusual spate of deadly shark attacks that have gripped Australia in recent years. Do the creatures purposely target humans, or is each assault a tragic case of mistaken identity? Plus, a look at how great white sharks have begun appearing in growing numbers off the beaches of Cape Cod, Massachusetts - where they have rarely been seen for hundreds of years.(n)

programme.desc: Documentary offering an insight into the lives of the many sharks that inhabit the sea, which include the great white, tiger and hammerhead.(n)

programme.title: I Survived a Fatal Flight
programme.desc: Documentary in which three people who were the lone survivors of aircraft crashes discuss their ordeals, detailing the conflicting emotions they experienced after realising everyone else on board had died. D-Day veteran Phil Bradley was trapped in his seat for 36 hours after the plane he was travelling on crashed in Virginia in 1959, while Annette Herfkens drank rainwater to stay alive after a Vietnam Airlines jet crashed into a mountain in 1992. Juliane Koepcke, meanwhile, tells of being lost for 10 days in the Peruvian rainforest after a plane crash in 1971, and how her knowledge of jungle terrain helped to save her life.(n)

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: An insight into the lives of some of the world's cutest animals.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Sharks of the Coral Canyon
programme.desc: Documentary looking at the hunting behaviour of sharks, including footage of nighttime hunting, as well as the link they share with coral reefs.(n)

programme.title: Shark
programme.desc: A look at how scientists are challenging traditional perceptions of sharks, with breakthroughs regarding the creatures' intelligence and social skills presenting them in a surprising new light. The programme also highlights some researchers' beliefs that studying the predators could help to solve some of the most pressing medical challenges of the 21st century. Narrated by Paul McGann. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: The Girl Who Talked to Dolphins
programme.desc: Documentary exploring an attempt to teach a dolphin to understand English. In the 1960s, a scientist flooded a house and invited a young woman to live there full time with the animal in the hope that the creature would be able to communicate with her. Featuring contributions from those involved in the experiment, who are speaking about events for the first time.(n)

programme.title: Bahama Blue
programme.desc: Looking at the Sand Flats and the creatures that live there, including iguanas, stingrays and bottlenose dolphins.(n)

programme.title: Bahama Blue
programme.desc: Looking at species including Oceanic whitetip sharks, sperm whales and Blainesville's beaked whales as they survive in the open water in the Bahamas.(n)

programme.title: Bahama Blue
programme.desc: Looking at how the interconnected ecosystems and species in the Bahamas depend on each other in order to survive. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: Two astronauts awake from suspended animation, finding the rest of the crew nowhere to be found and that they are suffering from memory loss. As one of them explores the vessel, he is set upon by hordes of mutated cannibals and faces a battle for survival as he tries to remember what their mission is(n)

programme.title: Fired Up!
programme.desc: Two high-school football stars talk their way into cheerleading camp in an effort to spend the summer with 300 gorgeous girls. Their plan goes awry though, when one of them unexpectedly falls in love(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: Comedy about Paul Blart, a man who has missed out on his dream of becoming a respected cop and is settling for patrolling the local mall with delusions of grandeur. He takes his role very seriously, much to the chagrin of his colleagues, but he gets his chance to impress when a group of thieves raid the mall(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: Zohan is a disco-loving Israeli commando with unstoppable fighting skills and a secret dream: he yearns to move to New York City and become a hairdresser. After faking his own death, he makes that dream come true(n)

programme.title: Little Miss Sunshine
programme.desc: In this uproarious road comedy, parents take their spunky 7-year-old daughter and dysfunctional family from New Mexico to California for a kiddie beauty pageant(n)

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: Enticement leads to terror when Lisa, a sexy office temp, forms a dangerous fixation on a successful and happily married asset manager named Derek. As her obsession progresses to stalking, Derek's idyllic marriage and promising career slowly disintegrate, until the once-happy couple and their newborn are forced into hiding as Lisa's wrath threatens to destroy them entirely(n)

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens mistake images of 1980s arcade games as a sign of aggression, they attack Earth with evil versions of Pac-Man, Donkey Kong and other video-game characters. In response, the U.S. president (Kevin James) asks his old gamer pals (Adam Sandler, Josh Gad, and Peter Dinklage) to battle the invaders(n)

programme.title: Wild Hogs
programme.desc: Four friends fed up with their mid-life crunch goes for a motorbike road-trip and got to pass through the biker gangsters(n)

programme.title: Cheaper by the Dozen
programme.desc: Family friendly fare about ambitious Midwestern parents trying to balance their burgeoning careers with the mayhem of raising 12 children(n)

programme.title: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, the Bakers bring their 12 children together for a summer vacation that turns into a comical competition with Tom's longtime rival(n)

programme.title: Black Sheep
programme.desc: Dopey Mike is a liability for his elder brother, an aspiring politician. So he's palmed off on an aide who has orders to keep him out of trouble, but it doesn't take long for Mike to hit the headlines(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: Zohan is a disco-loving Israeli commando with unstoppable fighting skills and a secret dream: he yearns to move to New York City and become a hairdresser. After faking his own death, he makes that dream come true(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: The gang from Friday and Next Friday are back in this urban comedy, in which Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) have finally moved out of their respective parents' homes and gotten an apartment together. However, a bogus neighborhood Santa Claus (Rickey Smiley) decides to help Craig and Day-Day share the wealth by robbing their apartment, and when he rips off their stereo, he also makes off with their rent money, which was hidden in the speaker cabinets. Desperate to make rent and have some money for Christmas presents, Craig and Day-Day land jobs at a local strip mall, where their fathers, Mr. Jones (John Witherspoon) and Uncle Elroy (Don "D.C." Curry), have gone into business together running a barbecue joint. Craig and Day-Day are installed as security guards, and while Craig tries to make time with Donna (K.D. Aubert), a saleswoman at the Pimp N' Ho's Boutique, and keep things orderly at Holy Moly's Doughnut Shop, Day-Day attempts to transform himself into a master of crime-fighting, which causes a lot more problems than it solves. Friday After Next is the first feature film from director Marcus Raboy, who previously directed music videos for Sting, Li'l Kim, Staind, and Friday After Next star Ice Cube(n)

He takes his role very seriously, much to the chagrin of his colleagues, but he gets his chance to impress when a group of thieves raid the mall(n)

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Terminally uncool club-hopping brothers Doug and Steve Butabi---first seen strutting their head-bobbing stuff on "Saturday Night Live"---struggle to make it through the doors of the elite Roxbury Club and hobnob with "hotties." Chris Kattan, Will Ferrell, Dan Hedaya, Loni Anderson, Molly Shannon, Colin Quinn, Gigi Rice, Elisa Donovan, Meredith Scott Lynn, Jennifer Coolidge(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan

programme.title: Dragonheart
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure about a knight who is determined to rid the land of a tyrant king. Because it was dragon magic that brought the monarch to the throne, the knight is resolved to kill every dragon in the country. Finally, only one dragon remains - but instead of slaying him, the knight and the dragon join forces in an effort to restore a code of truth and honour to the land(n)

programme.title: Black Sheep
programme.desc: Dopey Mike is a liability for his elder brother, an aspiring politician. So he's palmed off on an aide who has orders to keep him out of trouble, but it doesn't take long for Mike to hit the headlines(n)

programme.title: Comes a Horseman
programme.desc: In this updated romantic-western the struggle of the lone rancher to conquer nature is replaced with a conflict more in keeping with modern times - the struggle against big business. Frank Athearn is a WWII veteran who returns to Montana in hope of setting up a small cattle ranch and finding peace. Instead, he must fight for both his land and his life. Ella Connors is another small rancher, determined to hold onto her land, no matter what the price. And J.W. Ewing is a great cattle baron, obsessed with keeping his vast domain intact. The struggle against both the elements and the sinister intentions of big business brings Frank and Ella into close contact. They form an alliance to keep their land out of the hands of would-be oil profiteers. And what begins as a conflict of interest rapidly escalates into a full scale range war(n)

programme.title: Men at Work
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen and Emilio Estevez star as two bin men caught up in a farcical murder mystery(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots!
programme.desc: In the same vein as Airplane! and the Naked Gun series, Jim Abrahams' comedy is an affectionate parody of Top Gun and An Officer and a Gentleman , with pastiches from, among other titles, 91/2 Weeks , Gone with the Wind and The Fabulous Baker Boys . Charlie Sheen plays Lt Topper Hadley, ace of flying aces, needed to wipe out a nuclear installation in a hostile counrty. He finds himself in conflict with Lt Kent Greogry in the air and on the ground for the love of psychiatrist Ramada Thompson, while more comic relief comes from Lloyd Bridges as Thomas 'Tug' Benson, the dimwitted admiral in charge of them all. Hot Shots! Part Deux is on tomorrow night(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots! Part Deux
programme.desc: This film makes fun of Hollywood films like 'Rambo', 'The Wizard of Oz', 'Basic Instinct' and 'The Crying Game'. A sequel to 'Hot Shots!'(n)

programme.title: Major League
programme.desc: Trying to throw the season, a scheming baseball owner goes out of her way to build the worst baseball team possible, bringing together a mismatched group of losers. Despite the odds against them, this team of misfits somehow manages to become an improbable winner in this sports comedy(n)

programme.title: Navy SEALs
programme.desc: A pair of feuding Navy SEALs must work together to stop a terrorist who has stolen a supply of American missiles(n)

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Terminally uncool club-hopping brothers Doug and Steve Butabi---first seen strutting their head-bobbing stuff on "Saturday Night Live"---struggle to make it through the doors of the elite Roxbury Club and hobnob with "hotties." Chris Kattan, Will Ferrell, Dan Hedaya, Loni Anderson, Molly Shannon, Colin Quinn, Gigi Rice, Elisa Donovan, Meredith Scott Lynn, Jennifer Coolidge(n)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: Action-packed sci-fi movie with spectacular effects, monsters and gore galore, starring Casper Van Dien. When Earth is threatened by an alien foe, teenager John Rico (Van Dien) signs up for the military and prepares to fight for his country, leaving his high-school sweetheart and anxious parents behind. Put through vigorous and brutal basic training, Rico and his fellow troopers are primed for combat against their vicious enemy, the giant, bug-like aliens of the planet Klendathu, but nothing can fully prepare them for the harsh realities of war. They soon find themselves fighting not for Queen and Country, but for their very lives. Will the square-jawed heroes of Earth survive this gruesome intergalactic war, or will they become just another helping of human flavoured bug bait?(n)

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Martial arts superstar Jackie Chan is back in action in this riveting thriller about a disgraced Hong Kong police inspector seeking revenge on a gang of sadistic punks that wiped out his entire unit. Nicholas Tse, Charlie Yeung, Charlene Choi, Daniel Wu. Directed by Benny Chan(n)

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Gerard Butler stars in Marc Forster's violent, fact-based drama about a substance-addicted criminal who finds God and relocates to Sudan to offer his own idiosyncratic brand of Christian charity. The film initially portrays Sam Childers as being a far from nice man: a misogynistic biker whose life is steeped in crime, narcotics and violence, and who quickly returns to armed robbery almost as soon as he's released from jail. But while he was inside, his wife Lynn found Jesus, and, after Sam gets stabbed, she urges him to join her at church. Sam subsequently has his own Damascene moment and starts life afresh, founding his own (legitimate) construction company. Before long he has also built his own church. But it's only after a trip to Sudan, where he witnesses the devastation wrought by the marauding Lord's Resistance Army, that he truly becomes driven. Relocating to the African country, he sets up a faith-based centre to care for victims of the LRA's violence and rape. And also takes up arms to literally fight the good fight... Also starring Michael Shannon(n)

programme.title: Starship Troopers

programme.title: Excess Baggage
programme.desc: Brazen teen Alicia Silverstone stages her own kidnapping to gain her father's attention, but ends up in the hands of a car thief(n)

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: . In the waning days of World War II, General Douglas MacArthur chose to make good on a pledge that he made in 1942 -- that he would return to the Philippines after he and his troops were forced to retreat. However, MacArthur's determination was more than a matter of pride. Over 500 American soldiers were being held in Cabanatuan, a notoriously brutal prisoner of war camp in the Philippines operated by the Japanese army, and MacArthur wanted to see to it that they made it home(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino's delirious, highly stylized homage to samurai films, kung-fu movies and spaghetti Westerns. Uma Thurman stars as an assassin who awakens from a four-year coma and seeks revenge on those who left her for dead on her wedding day(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: Vengeful assassin The Bride killed two of her enemies in Vol. One. Now she's out to settle old scores with three more adversaries: Elle, Budd and Bill, the man she once loved(n)

programme.title: The Big Hit
programme.desc: Fast-moving action comedy about a good-natured but insecure hit man. When his gang kidnaps a girl who turns out to be their boss's godchild, the hit man, already a victim of treachery in his love life, finds his life coming apart at the seams(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino's delirious, highly stylized homage to samurai films, kung-fu movies and spaghetti Westerns. Uma Thurman stars as an assassin who awakens from a four-year coma and seeks revenge on those who left her for dead on her wedding day(n)

programme.desc: Vengeful assassin The Bride killed two of her enemies in Vol. One. Now she's out to settle old scores with three more adversaries: Elle, Budd and Bill, the man she once loved(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Director Gore Verbinski and the crew set sail once again for this, the third chapter in the swashbuckling Pirates of the Caribbean trilogy. Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp) is hopelessly trapped in Davy Jones' locker after a harrowing encounter with the dreaded Kracken, and now Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) and Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) must align themselves with the nefarious Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) if they hold out any hope of saving their old friend from a fate worse than death. The East India Trading Company and its fearsome leader, Lord Cutler Beckett (Tom Hollander), have taken control of the ghostly Flying Dutchman and its captain, Davy Jones (Bill Nighy), and now the baleful Admiral Norrington (Jack Davenport) has taken the helm in a relentless bid to destroy every pirate ship in his path and bring the Age of Piracy to a violent close. Meanwhile, Will, Elizabeth, and Captain Barbossa navigate treacherous waters and face bitter betrayal as they set sail to gather the only army that can stand up to Beckett -- The Nine Lords of the Brethren Court. But Captain Jack Sparrow is one of the lords, and as long as he's stuck in Davy Jones' locker, Beckett and his nefarious armada are sure to emerge victorious. There's still hope, however, if the heroic team that includes Tia Dalma (Naomie Harris), Pintel (Lee Arenberg), and Ragetti (Mackenzie Crook) can reach exotic Singapore and convince vulpine pirate Sao Feng (Chow Yun-Fat) to provide them with charts and a ship. But even the powerful Brethren Court may need a bit of help from volatile sea goddess Calypso in order to weather the coming storm. With the entire future of the pirate way at stake, everyone will be forced to choose sides while drifting precariously to the edge of the earth for one final, spectacular battle(n)

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: Till Death Do Us Part. It's off to Wilson County, Texas for the A-Team, at the behest of young businesswoman Jackie Taylor (Janice Heiden). It seems that Jackie is being forced to marry Calvin Cutter (John Ericson), her late husband's former partner--and the man whom Jackie suspects of murdering her dad. In order to effect the team's traditional last-minute rescue, a flustered Face (Dirk Benedict) is forced to don wig and gown and substitute for the bride (and guess who pops out of the wedding cake)!(n)

programme.title: 14 Blades
programme.desc: In this exciting period action film, noble Jinyiwei Qinglong must fight his former allies after an evil eunuch overthrows the Emperor. In order to restore the Emperor to his throne, Qinglong must now defeat the very assassins he once fought alongside(n)

programme.title: Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla
programme.desc: Director Masaaki Tezuka follows up his debut feature Godzilla vs. Megaguirus with another movie starring everyone's favorite giant lizard. One of at least three films in the history of the Godzilla franchise to find the merciless reptile pitted against his mechanical counterpart, Godzilla x Mechagodzilla finds humans under attack by the green beast. With little hope left, they build the giant man-piloted robot Mechagodzilla to defend the world. This film was also released under the titles Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla and Gojira x Mekagojira. Tezuka's next film, Godzilla x Mothra x Mechagodzilla: Tokyo S.O.S. upped ante even further, with the addition of Mothra into the mix(n)

programme.title: Never Back Down
programme.desc: After gridiron hunk Jake is beaten by school bully Ryan in a martial arts battle, he enlists a veteran fighter to teach him how to win(n)

programme.title: Way of The Dragon
programme.desc: A martial-artist goes to Rome to help relatives battle mobsters trying to take over their restaurant(n)

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: This time, the disaster-prone Annie Porter battles a madman on a cruise ship with the help of her new boyfriend(n)
